body: It was going wholesome lets say that until pages 30-32
I didn’t even notice that she had one arm until close to the end wtf
This is fucking adorable. A man seeing through diformity to find love is so fucking romantic.
I agree with DragonDfire it's very weird to say it's very....honest in the way it dose the whole pet thin.Ive see sequels to this so well see where they go with it
I've fapped to this and  I love it
this is more horrific than sexy for me
I absolutely loved Hitomebore. Probably one of the best VNs i've played because of it's shorter length, simple premise and just all around loveable cast (except that one bitch)
Getting a dorei no Seikatsu feeling (Oh, look what I did there xD) with this.

It doesnt have any sexual content, but I am not disappointed by that all, rather I am disappointed by the ending, which leaves a lot of things open. The main charm of this Vn is the female lead, which, like I insinuated, is probably one of the cutest things ever. You should check it out if you just want a quick read that can melt your heart, lol.
Wow, now I am intrigued to read this VN. Some sexual content would have been great though.
Nope, Im talking about "Love at first sight", or "Hitomebore."
Pfft are you talking about Dorei no Seikatsu?

After playing one of the cutest VNs ever with a girl that looked similiar to this one (except not so thin), Im pretty much used to this and can even kinda appreciate her looks. Ah well, cant really fap to it, but I still find it cute.
Well, it's good old vanilla, even if creepy. But i can't stop thinking - with the eye so big, she literaly must not have brain. Huh.
ok ...... so did anyone actually like this ? Cuz its a bit weird to say the least !
